He then left me on hold for 5 minutes before picking up the phone and telling me I never texted them (which I did). I then verbally told him my address and asked him to bring it down. He then told me I would have to text his wifes phone my address for a delivery. Out of pure frustration I hung up the phone. I wouldnt't ever try this food after being mocked and laughed at.
author: Holmes C.

description: Ordered 2 burritos and some tacos from here for the first time today. Delivery took well over an hour and when the food arrived the tacos were wet and chewy and gross. So I tried a burrito. Yuck. This is the worst Mexican food I have ever had the misfortune to eat. I ate about a third, gave up in disgust and threw it in the trash along side the tacos. I paid $28.00 for this crap and learnt my lesson. DO NOt eat here.
author: Tony C.

description: When I first showed up to this place, I was overwhelmed with hunger and excitement of a new burrito place in my hood. Now after countless visits, hoping it would improve, I have to update my review to only 2 stars. Service, is great. The food is just lackluster. Papalote has it's wonderfully wrapped burritos with the most delicious sauce. Cancun has just overwhelming large and filling eats, and Little Chihuahua just kills it with high quality and a great price. This place just needs to increase the flavor and quality of their burritos.
author: Devon C.

description: we called to place an order the menu seemed good. However, after over an hour of waiting for delivery we called to see if everything was ok. the man who answered the phone said that he would call the delivery guy and see when he would be arriving and give us a call back. we thanked him and waited another 20 min then got a call and went down stairs where we saw that  their was in fact no on there. after waiting about 5min we called to ensure they were on the right st. the guy said hold on and put the phone down and started laughing and picking on us for still calling. once he returned to the phone he asked our address. so we said thanks but we will no longer be using their business and hung up. UNPROFESSIONAL AND RUDE.
author: Elizabeth F.

description: I placed an order at 6pm through Grubhub. It's 8pm and I finally just canceled the order. Not only did the person on the phone not explain the 2-hour delay, they didn't bother to apologize.
author: Emily E.

description: Cheap and tasty mexican food. They offer more variety than the usual places I have been to. Your burrito is made with your  choice of spinach/tomato/flour tortillas and is huge! Staff is super friendly n polite. This place is nothing fancy, just your quick stop for a budget friendly bite.
author: Natasha I.

description:
I would have liked  to have rated this between a 3 and 4, but unfortunately its not an option.

We had ordered through Seamless Web and after I placed my order decided to go on Yelp. I have to say I was a bit taken aback from the reviews so I suppose my expectations were lowered. The food came within an hour, and it arrived hot. I ordered:

breakfast chorizo burrito, which if I don't say so myself, is pretty awesome.

We also ordered the tacos- al pastor and chicken- my advice- skip these. Not too much flavor, pretty dry, and the soft corn tortilla broke within the first bite. 

Along with those two items we also ordered a chili relleno, which was A-Ok. 

I would order here again!

Thanks Estrella Taqueria!
author: Blair H.

description: Average at best, there's just too many great mexican options to bother going here again.  Lots of food for the money however.
author: Rick W.

description:
First off it's the worst Mexican food I've ever had. Really! I've been eating Mexican food my whole life. I grew up & hour from the border of Baja. My mother can make better Mexican food & she's not even Mexican. I thought Mexican was supposed to be like sex... even when it's bad... it's still good. Not in this case.. it's just BAD. They do deliver if you're desperate. They seem to be the only Mexican food place that does. But, think twice this is what happened to me last night after ordering food off of Grub Hub. 

I called to check on my order because it had been an hr & a half late. The woman had know idea what I was talking about & could barely speak English. She said she'd call me back. She didn't so I called her back. Then she hung up on me! Then for the next 40min I kept calling & the phone just kept ringing. Now they were purposely ignoring the phone!!! Then 2 hrs later the food shows after we already ate dinner!!!!!

HERE'S A DESCRIPTION OF MY ORDER: **Food arrived cold**

1 prawn quesadilla. Only 3 shrimp in it! The shrimp was fishy, not fresh & over cooked

Burrito did not have the sour cream on it that I specially ordered & paid for

Was missing the drink we paid for

The taco salad had no cheese or guacamole on it. The lettuce was soggy because they obviously forgot to deliver it. That's why all the food was cold!

So now they owe me money. Guess I'll have to go personally in there to collect it. THIS PLACE SUCKS!!!!
author: april m.

description: I'm quite surprised at the low reviews - this is a pretty decent taqueria. I'm not from this part of town, but I had a super taco with carnitas and a cheese quesadilla, both of which were quite good. Liked the salsa. This place is at minimum an average (and likely better than average) taco joint.
author: A I.

description:
The food is cheap, and I ordered delivery. It took them almost 2 hours to deliver the food (1 hour of the estimated time) and when we called to check the status of the order (about 1 hour and 25 minutes in) they said "20 more minutes". When we explained that it had already been over 1 hour, the man on the other end said "we will call you back" and never did. 

On top of that, they messed up our order. Like I said, the food was decently priced, but the customer service was terrible. I can find similar, if not better, food with a faster response time and a better customer experience. I was very disappointed.
author: Corin D.

description: if I could I would give negative stars, ordered off eat24 and they didn't even deliver the food, AFTER I HAD PAID. seriously this place blows.
author: Adam S.

description: This review is based solely off of the one menu item that kept me alive the first few weeks I lived in the lower haight and had not yet been grocery shopping. The super taco! This perfectly proportioned 2 tortilla masterpiece piled high with beans, rice, meat, lettuce, cheese, sour cream, guac... pretty much everything you would find in a burrito, "taco", is a whole meal in itself and is still under $5. Perfect for someone like me/ pretty much anyone who orders a burrito and gets to the halfway point where the, "do I just go for it and polish this baby off or am I good and wrap the second half up for later (which usually ends up being an hour later)" game is played. Minus one star for the never warm chips and the mediocre salsa, but hey, you get what you pay for and they're free with the super taco.
author: Lauren S.

description: MUCH BETTER than it's predecessor...new owners from what I'm told.  The place could use a little more flair, but the food is pretty excellent.  The cochinita pibil is super savory...nachos rock...and the carnitas burritos just killer!  Hope they're around for a while.
author: Ranch S.

description: If you're stuck in the Lower Haight and want Mexican this place will do. Nothing really special but they're reasonably priced. The pollo asado is great and makes up for the fact that they don't know how to roll a burrito.
author: Hamid L.

description: I used to come here regularly for a couple of years now.....i was a regular....there seems to be a disturbing trend in places that serve food....you would think that if you are a regular (like almost everyday) you would be appreciated and not treated like shit....however , that is not the case.....the more you go , the more terrible you are treated!.....this time i ordered a burrito like i always do....and this time though it was a different person making it....let me just say that i used to come in here thinking that the people were nice and treated you nicely....i did notice that the nice treatment diminished each time i went.....this time was the worst....everyone behind the counter looked like someone just died.......i recieved service with no smile and when i recieved my burrito i noticed it was much smaller than usual ....so, i said something and then thats when the girl at the counter let me have it with negative comments and stares........basically, because i wanted a vegetarian burrito with out cheese and with out salsa they will make it smaller....but....just because i don't want cheese or salsa doesn't mean i want a smaller burrito when i ordered a super burrito!the fact that they made it smaller is not the problem...it is what happened after that ...i have eaten there for several years now and it was like i was a drunk stranger that they wanted to get rid of!.....well, i will not be going back there and i encourage others to stay away!The place is also very dirty , like they never clean the place....i guess i should have read the yelp reviews before i ate there
author: ed z.
